item.title: Hey, NativeScript!
item.description: Purpose Right, so you may have seen Ionic, or Cordova based hybrid mobile applications - But you ask yourself, is there a better way to write a cross-platform mobile application in native code without using browser based UI and rendering? Well, Telerik has been developing a solution called NativeSCript - It transpiles good old web code (JS, CSS) or the Angular/Typscript solution into native code. ie. Java (Android) and Swift/Objective C (iOS).
